FAIL_TO_PASS: when implicit help option then help option not affected
when may be duplicate identical candidates then only return one
when helpOption(false) then -h is an unknown option
help: when user args ["sub", "--help"] then program/sub help called 0/1
when negated option then sort negated option separately
when help option disabled then not candidate for suggestion
when short flag obscured then help term is --help
when helpOption has custom description then helpInformation include custom description
when specify --help then exit
when help requested then context.error is false
when copyInheritedSettings then copies helpOption(false)
help: when user args ["sub", "foo", "--help"] then program/sub help called 0/1
when helpOption has just custom short flag then custom short flag invokes help
when lone short and long flags then sort on lone flag
when override createOption then used for help option in visibleOptions
when helpOption(true) after customise then helpInformation still customised
when add option then visible (with help)
when mixed case flags then sort is case insensitive
when helpOption(true) after false then helpInformation does include --help
when default then help term is -h, --help
